Package workshop.applicationEvents

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OrderFinishedEvent
    Special class only for particular type of ApplicationEvent which invokes in Order.preUpdate() when all Order's Task's are set to Task#getFinished() or the Order itself is set to 'finished' state.
    UserRegisteredEvent
    Special class only for particular type of ApplicationEvent which is invoked in Uuid @PostPersist method to force the WorkshopApplication to send an email for the new User with the confirmation link.
    WorkshopEntitiesEventPublisher
    Helper class.
    WorkshopEventListener
    Depending on kind of caught ApplicationEvent this class reacts accordingly: creates and sends emails, do phone SMS-servicing etc.
